remarks: Show that the support of a function is contained in a set.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Mar-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ suppss2 as of 28-May-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:

suppss2OLD $p |- ( ph -> ( `' ( k e. A |-> B ) " ( _V \ { Z } ) ) C_ W ) $.

$d W k $.
$d Z k $.
